blocks.name: taupilem3
blocks.content: Lemma for tau-related theorems. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 16-Feb-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm taupilem3(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1)))), wa(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat1)))
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1)))), wa(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat1)), wa(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c0, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1)))))
  elin(c0, crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1)))
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c0, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat1))
  syl6rbbr(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c0, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat1)))
  biantrurd(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat1), wcel(c0, cc))
  rpcn(c0)
  mp2b(wb(wcel(c0, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat1))), wf(ccos, cc, cc), wfn(ccos, cc))
  cosf()
  ffn(ccos, cc, cc)
  fniniseg(ccos, cc, c0, nat1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm taupilem3(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(ℝ+ ⋂(`' cos " { 1 }))↔(c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧(cos ` c0)= 1))
} = {
  bitri(c0 ∈(ℝ+ ⋂(`' cos " { 1 })), (c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧(cos ` c0)= 1), (c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c0 ∈(`' cos " { 1 })))
  elin(c0, crp, (`' cos " { 1 }))
  pm5.32i(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c0 ∈(`' cos " { 1 }), (cos ` c0)= 1)
  syl6rbbr(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c0 ∈(`' cos " { 1 }), (cos ` c0)= 1, (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧(cos ` c0)= 1))
  biantrurd(c0 ∈ ℝ+, (cos ` c0)= 1, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  rpcn(c0)
  mp2b((c0 ∈(`' cos " { 1 })↔(c0 ∈ ℂ ∧(cos ` c0)= 1)), (cos : ℂ → ℂ), cos[Fn]ℂ)
  cosf()
  ffn(ccos, cc, cc)
  fniniseg(ccos, cc, c0, nat1)
}

blocks.name: taupilemrplb
blocks.content: A set of positive reals has (in the reals) a lower bound. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 19-Feb-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm taupilemrplb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cin(crp, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  mp2an(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cin(crp, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))), wcel(nat0, cr), wral(s1, cin(crp, c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1))))
  0re()
  rgen(s1, cin(crp, c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1)))
  rpge0d(cv(s1), wcel(cv(s1), cin(crp, c0)))
  sseli(cv(s1), cin(crp, c0), crp)
  inss1(crp, c0)
  rspcev(s0, nat0, cr, wral(s1, cin(crp, c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1))), wral(s1, cin(crp, c0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))
  ralbidv(s1, cin(crp, c0), wceq(cv(s0), nat0), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1)))
  breq1(cv(s0), nat0, cle, cv(s1))
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, cin(crp, c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s1)))
  diff.cin.s(s0, crp, c0)
  diff.crp.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, nat0, cle, cv(s1))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), nat0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm taupilemrplb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈(ℝ+ ⋂ c0), s0[≤]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  mp2an(∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈(ℝ+ ⋂ c0), s0[≤]s1)), 0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈(ℝ+ ⋂ c0), 0[≤]s1))
  0re()
  rgen(s1, (ℝ+ ⋂ c0), 0[≤]s1)
  rpge0d(s1, s1 ∈(ℝ+ ⋂ c0))
  sseli(s1, (ℝ+ ⋂ c0), crp)
  inss1(crp, c0)
  rspcev(s0, nat0, cr, ∀(s1 ∈(ℝ+ ⋂ c0), 0[≤]s1), ∀(s1 ∈(ℝ+ ⋂ c0), s0[≤]s1))
  ralbidv(s1, (ℝ+ ⋂ c0), s0 = 0, s0[≤]s1, 0[≤]s1)
  breq1(s0, nat0, cle, s1)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, (ℝ+ ⋂ c0), 0[≤]s1)
  diff.cin.s(s0, crp, c0)
  diff.crp.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, nat0, cle, s1)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, nat0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: taupilem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ taupi . A positive real whose cosine is one is at least ` 2 x. _pi ` . (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 19-Feb-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm taupilem1(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat1)), wbr(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cle, c0))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat1)), wbr(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cle, c0), wbr(co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cle, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))))
  syl5eqbr(co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cle, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat1, wa(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat1)))
  dividi(co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  recni(co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  gt0ne0ii(co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat1)), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat1), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, crp), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), crp))
  rpgt0d(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), wa(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), crp)))
  rpdivcl(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat1)), wb(wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)))), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cz))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat1), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cz))
  syl(wcel(c0, crp), wb(wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat1), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cz)), wcel(c0, cc))
  rpcn(c0)
  coseq1(c0)
  zgt0ge1(co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat1)), wb(wbr(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cle, c0), wbr(co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cle, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)))), wcel(c0, cr))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), nat1), wcel(c0, cr))
  rpre(c0)
  mp3an13(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wbr(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cle, c0), wbr(co(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cle, co(c0, cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)))), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cr), wa(wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))))
  pm3.2i(wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)))
  ax-mp(wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cr), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), crp))
  rpre(co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  ax-mp(wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), crp))
  mp2an(wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), crp), wcel(nat2, crp), wcel(cpi, crp))
  2rp()
  pirp()
  rpmulcl(nat2, cpi)
  rpgt0(co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  lediv1(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), c0, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
}

blocks.name: taupilem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ taupi . The smallest positive real whose cosine is one is at most ` 2 x. _pi ` . (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 19-Feb-2019.) (Revised by AV, 1-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm taupilem2() {
  |- wbr(ctau, cle, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
} = {
  eqbrtri(ctau, cle, co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cinf(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), cr, clt))
  df-tau()
  mp3an(wbr(cinf(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), cr, clt), cle, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), wss(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), cr), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(hs1, cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)))), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1)))))
  sstri(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), cr, crp)
  inss1(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1)))
  rpssre()
  taupilemrplb(hs0, hs1, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1)))
  mpbir2an(wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1)))), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), crp), wceq(cfv(ccos, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat1))
  mp2an(wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), crp), wcel(nat2, crp), wcel(cpi, crp))
  2rp()
  pirp()
  rpmulcl(nat2, cpi)
  cos2pi()
  taupilem3(co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  infrelb(hs0, hs1, cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))))
  diff.hs1.c(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm taupilem2() {
  ⊢ τ[≤](2[×]π)
} = {
  eqbrtri(ctau, cle, (2[×]π), inf((ℝ+ ⋂(`' cos " { 1 })), ℝ, <))
  df-tau()
  mp3an(inf((ℝ+ ⋂(`' cos " { 1 })), ℝ, <)[≤](2[×]π), (ℝ+ ⋂(`' cos " { 1 }))⊆ ℝ, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs1 ∈(ℝ+ ⋂(`' cos " { 1 })), hs0[≤]hs1)), (2[×]π)∈(ℝ+ ⋂(`' cos " { 1 })))
  sstri((ℝ+ ⋂(`' cos " { 1 })), cr, crp)
  inss1(crp, (`' cos " { 1 }))
  rpssre()
  taupilemrplb(hs0, hs1, (`' cos " { 1 }))
  mpbir2an((2[×]π)∈(ℝ+ ⋂(`' cos " { 1 })), (2[×]π)∈ ℝ+, (cos `(2[×]π))= 1)
  mp2an((2[×]π)∈ ℝ+, 2 ∈ ℝ+, π ∈ ℝ+)
  2rp()
  pirp()
  rpmulcl(nat2, cpi)
  cos2pi()
  taupilem3((2[×]π))
  infrelb(hs0, hs1, (ℝ+ ⋂(`' cos " { 1 })), (2[×]π))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((`' cos " { 1 }))
  diff.hs0.c((ℝ+ ⋂(`' cos " { 1 })))
  diff.hs1.c((ℝ+ ⋂(`' cos " { 1 })))
}

blocks.name: taupi
blocks.content: Relationship between ` _tau ` and ` _pi ` . This can be seen as connecting the ratio of a circle's circumference to its radius and the ratio of a circle's circumference to its diameter. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 19-Feb-2019.) (Revised by AV, 1-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm taupi() {
  |- wceq(ctau, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
} = {
  mpbir2an(wceq(ctau, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), wbr(ctau, cle, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), wbr(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cle, ctau))
  taupilem2()
  breqtrri(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cle, ctau, cinf(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), cr, clt))
  mprgbir(hs0, cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), wbr(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cle, cinf(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), cr, clt)), wbr(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cle, cv(hs0)))
  mp2an(wb(wbr(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cle, cinf(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), cr, clt)), wral(hs0, cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), wbr(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cle, cv(hs0)))), w3a(wss(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), cr), wne(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), emptycls), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(hs1, cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1))))), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cr))
  infregelb(hs0, hs1, hs0, cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1)))), wbr(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cle, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wceq(cfv(ccos, cv(hs0)), nat1)))
  taupilem3(cv(hs0))
  taupilem1(cv(hs0))
  letri3i(ctau, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  eqeltri(ctau, cr, cinf(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), cr, clt))
  df-tau()
  ax-mp(wcel(cinf(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), cr, clt), cr), w3a(wss(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), cr), wne(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), emptycls), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(hs1, cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1))))))
  3pm3.2i(wss(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), cr), wne(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), emptycls), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(hs1, cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)))))
  sstri(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), cr, crp)
  inss1(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1)))
  rpssre()
  ne0ii(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))), co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  mpbir2an(wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1)))), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), crp), wceq(cfv(ccos, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), nat1))
  mp2an(wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), crp), wcel(nat2, crp), wcel(cpi, crp))
  2rp()
  pirp()
  rpmulcl(nat2, cpi)
  cos2pi()
  taupilem3(co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  taupilemrplb(hs0, hs1, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1)))
  infrecl(hs0, hs1, cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))))
  remulcli(nat2, cpi)
  2re()
  pire()
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))))
  diff.hs1.c(cin(crp, cima(ccnv(ccos), csn(nat1))))
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
}
